What happened The Huskies   opened MAC play with a  win over the Kent State Golden Flashes   MAC Saturday at Huskie Stadium PERIOD

How it happened Redshirt Anthony Maddie led two of the Huskies three scoring drives and NIU escaped with a  win over the Golden Flashes PERIOD The offense never looked like it found its rhythm PERIOD

The Huskies got on the board as DaRon Brown rushed into the end zone from  yards out on an end around from left to right with  to play in the second quarter PERIOD Anthony Maddie engineered the nineplay 80yard drive PERIOD

The Golden Flashes responded driving inside NIUs 1yard line but settled for a 19yard field goal from Anthony Melchiori PERIOD NIU led  at the half PERIOD

The Huskies opened the second half with a 40yard field goal by Tyler Wedel PERIOD They extended their lead to  as Jordan Huff registered his first career TD with an 18yard run  into the third quarter PERIOD Redshirt sophomore quarterback Drew Hare and Maddie led the scoring drives respectively PERIOD

Melchiori drew the Golden Flashes within  with a 27yard field goal by Melchiori late in the third quarter PERIOD Kent State quarterback Colin Reardon capped off a sevenplay 80yard drive with a 2yard bootleg touchdown run PERIOD The Golden Flashes converted the 2point conversion and drew with  with  to play PERIOD

The Golden Flashes were driving late but Reardon and backup quarterback Nathan Strock got injured on backtoback plays and the NIU defense preserved the win PERIOD
